title: Windows 11 will soon offer HDR calibration, just like Xbox
content:
Microsoft is working on adding an HDR calibration feature to DirectX on Windows, similar to what’s available on Xbox consoles. The company has announced that it will be launching a Windows HDR Calibration app that allows users to calibrate their HDR monitors. Calibrating HDR is important because brightness levels aren’t the same for every screen.

The post Windows 11 will soon offer HDR calibration, just like Xbox appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is working on an HDR calibration feature for Windows to ensure HDR games and content display properly on various HDR monitors.
